DOC.detailed_description: Study Design : One hundred patient acute exacerbation COPD admit regular pulmonology department via emergency room recruit give write informed consent . Inclusion criterion age > 40 year ≤ 80 year , least 10 pack year smoke history COPD least GOLD II . Each form physical therapy accept outside pulmonary rehabilitation . Exclusion criterion include participation pulmonary rehabilitation program precede year , comorbidity limit exercise training ( example : invalidating ischaemic heart disease , RA , malignancy lung embolus ) , intolerance prednisone , history asthma , non-compliance , finding chest radiography fitting sign COPD prior randomisation . During admission patient receive standard exacerbation COPD treatment consist O2 , combivent inhalation , antibiotic prednisone . Exercise capacity measure 6 minute walk test perform discharge . The COPD GOLD classification detect spirometry completion exacerbation therapy randomisation discharge . Both measurement repeat completion pulmonary rehabilitation program 3 month . Quality life evaluate follow questionnaire discharge : St. George respiratory questionnaire ( SGRQ ) , SF-36-scores ( short form health survey ) clinical COPD questionnaire ( CCQ ) . Before discharge , patient randomise computer minimisation program pulmonary rehabilitation usual care special attendance age ( < 70 year ≥ 70 year ) , sex , length hospital stay ( < 7 day ≥ 7 day ) , six minute walk test distance discharge ( < 100 ≥ 100 meter ) predict forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 < ≥ FEV1 ) . Pulmonary rehabilitation take place within ten day discharge shall give multidisciplinary team ( pulmonologist , respiratory nurse , physical therapist , dietician social worker ) . The program last 2 hour weekly ; 1 hour exercise train one hour education 8 week . All patient follow discharge 3 6 month . These questionnaire repeat accomplishment pulmonary rehabilitation program day 90 day 180 . Readmission rate also evaluate period .
